page.title: 16YOUTH PROVISION
page.content:
In 1984 a {Youth Development Team}was set up in {Blantyre}to look at problems affecting young people in the area. The {priorities}they have identified are unemployment, lack of communication/publicity, lack of facilities (for girls and the handicapped),friction between areas and Police involvement.
The{Blantyre Community Centre}offers facilities for playgroups, Senior Citizens, badminton and yoga. The Elizabeth Scott Centre offers similar pursuits, and in addition, an Unemployed club,dog obedience and a junior youth club.
A{Youth Enquiry Service YES}has been established and is mainly staffed by members of Blantyre Youth Council.
